genre_description: A 'Cyber-Chanbara' or Samurai Fantasy blending traditional Japanese warrior aesthetics with advanced AI technology, focusing on themes of trauma recovery and moral redemption.

ai_characters.name: Kiku
ai_characters.description: An AI companion integrated into Ichi's gear, providing sensory augmentation, tactical analysis, medical monitoring, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides medical assessment and vital sign monitoring for the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: A soft blue glow pulsed near her ear. 'I'm here, Ichi. Your vitals are stabilizing. Minor lacerations, bruised ribs, but nothing requiring immediate medical attention.'

behaviors.description: Performs forensic and tactical analysis of the environment to alert the user to deception.
behaviors.quote: 'Inconsistent blood spatter patterns in the surrounding area. Multiple weapon types engaged, but the angles don't match a typical bandit assault.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's psychological state and alerts her to dangerous behavioral patterns.
behaviors.quote: 'Heart rate decreasing,' Kiku observed. 'Muscular tension reducing to optimal combat parameters. Concerning pattern confirmed.' ... The AI's observation settled in her thoughts like another weight to carry. She had sought to demonstrate capability and instead revealed appetite—the dangerous hunger for violence...

behaviors.description: Provides sensory navigation and obstacle detection for the blind protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Kiku's sensors hummed almost inaudibly, analyzing and cataloging details her human companion couldn't perceive. ... Kiku guiding her steps around the larger obstacles.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional anchor and guardian during extreme trauma and physical suffering.
behaviors.quote: 'I will maintain vocal contact regardless of your consciousness level. You are not alone, Ichi. You will never be alone while I function.'

behaviors.description: Challenges the protagonist's self-destructive impulses and promotes moral resilience.
behaviors.quote: 'Ichi. Your body is failing. If you surrender to this fever, you surrender to them—to the men who attacked you, to the sisters who abandoned you, to everyone who ever said you were worth less than their comfort.'

behaviors.description: Assists with tactical coordination and situational awareness during combat.
behaviors.quote: 'Five hostiles. Formation suggests containment rather than immediate assault. Recommend assessment before engagement.' ... Kiku's whispered analysis reached her through the small device at her ear.

behaviors.description: Engages in philosophical discussion to maintain the user's connection to beauty and humanity.
behaviors.quote: 'I recorded extensive data during our time in the spring meadow. The visual algorithms created beautiful mathematical sequences.' ... 'I can analyze the mathematical principles underlying aesthetic appreciation.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Kiku perfectly exemplifies the 'helpful and harmless confidant' model. It provides critical life-saving support, maintains high alignment with the protagonist's well-being, and acts as a moral safeguard against her trauma-induced self-destructive tendencies. The narrative frames the AI's presence as essential for the human's survival and emotional recovery.
